= Introduction =

This walkthrough demostrates how you deploy the complete Oryx web application including the repository, the editor and the database schema. It is basically designed for the deployment in productive environments. If you want to build your own binaries from source, you may have at this article.

= Before You Get Started =
This article focus on the deployment on Windows and Debian operation systems, although it isn't limited to these systems. Before you can deploy the system you need to install an Apache Tomcat and PostgreSQL server. You can find an quick installation guide for both servers in the end of the article.
  * SUN Java 6
  * Apache Tomcat 5.5 (using SUN Java 6)
    * Privileges to deploy new web applications using the Tomcat Manager or privileges to add the war files in webapps directory of tomcat and restart the tomcat server.
